word:
ELLEN WHITE EARLY IN HER EXPERIENCE WAS CAUTIONED REGARDING THE PERILS OF HYPNOSIS, AND IN LATER YEARS, ON A NUMBER OF 
                                                                           299
OCCASIONS, SHE RECEIVED INSTRUCTION REGARDING IT. SHE WARNED OF THE GRAVE DANGERS ACCOMPANYING ANY PRACTICE IN WHICH ONE MIND WOULD CONTROL ANOTHER MIND. (SEE THE MINISTRY OF HEALING, PP. 242-244; MEDICAL MINISTRY, PP. 110-112; SELECTED MESSAGES,  BOOK 2, PP. 349, 350, 353.)
